TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {192620=That's the stuff we want to have in 4.2, very roughly ordered by priority. Releases are scheduled for early January 2009., 186435=Urgent tasks that need to be finished for the KDE 4.1 release (May 19th):}
textBeforeTable: Urgent tasks that need to be finished for the KDE 4.1 release (May 19th): KDE 4.1 / Akonadi 1.0 Core There is also a more detailed page about bugs and missing features of things that are currently ported here. Note: The person noted in the "Contact" column is not necessarily the one implementing that feature, but the one who can tell you what to do and how to help, i.e. you can also contribute to those tasks ;-) The following list contains the things which need to be done for Akonadi. Akonadi TODO 7.2 Meeting Notes 7.1 Documentation 7 Akonadi Internals 6.5 Links 6.4 Contact & Getting Involved 6.3 Projects 6.2 Documentation 6.1 Tutorials 6 Information for Developers using Akonadi 5.22 My Akonadi resource seems to randomly hang/stop working! 5.21 Akonadi needs too much space in my home directory! 5.20 When should I use Akonadi? 5.19 What is the relation between Akonadi
textAfterTable: Status Item Description Contact DONE Server error reporting Helpful error message when the server cannot be started or if there is some other problem communicating with it.
